attributes.action: encourage amendments to the Highway code to stop people riding horses 2 abreast on the roads, and to formalise horseriders access to cycle paths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a road user, there is nothing worse than crawling along behind selfish horse riders riding two abreast. It is bad enough that they are allowed on the road at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
